subject: [Radiance-general] Re: 2010 Workshop presentations, soon?
body:
I have uploaded the photos I took at the workshop, which Jan has as well, to my website:

http://www.anyhere.com/gward/pickup/RadWorkshop2010/

Clicking on any of the small images gets you a larger one.  A few of them are JPEG-HDR's, but you have to figure out which ones...  The only high-resolution one is the group photo, but everything is chronological, so you would have to scroll down to find it:

http://www.anyhere.com/gward/pickup/RadWorkshop2010/img/DSC_5504_l29B.jpg

Sorry for the sloppy presentation, but it's all I could manage in a short time.

Best,
-Greg
